episodes.title: We Snuck Into Scientology | *MOST DANGEROUS CULT*
episodes.description:
It’s been ONE full year since our original Bohemian Grove video premiered. So, to celebrate, we bring you a new cult—bigger, more dangerous, and far scarier... Scientology.

We want to keep making these videos, so please subscribe and let us know where to go next :)

Check out our merch at lmcine.com! 

Make sure to follow our other socials for more exclusive content!!! 
TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@lmcine
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/lmcinematic/
Patreon https://www.patreon.com/c/LMCine

Disclaimer: This video is intended for educational and commentary purposes only. The views and interpretations presented are based on publicly available information and personal analysis. No statements are made with the intent to defame, misrepresent, or harm any individual, organization, or belief system, including the Church of Scientology. All commentary falls within the scope of fair use, protected by applicable laws governing freedom of expression.

1:00 - Hidden Camera

6:26 - Outside view
7:17 - Tests
8:42 - Diagnosis 
11:07 - What is it?
11:58 - Escaping
14:29 - Money Scheme
14:52 - Missing person
15:24 - Overview
